com.teamten.render

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.render.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends Object
    A renderer from geometry to image files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Renderer(int superSample)
      Creates a renderer with the specified parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTriangle(Triangle triangle)
      Add a triangle to the geometry being rendered.
      void lookAt(Vector eye, Vector target, Vector up)
      Position the camera at "eye" looking at "target" with "up" either specified or pointing to the Y axis if null.
      void prepareGeometry()
      Precompute various geometry things, like bounding boxes.
      BufferedImage render(int width, int height, float u, float v, float du, float dv)
      Generate an image of size width and height.
      void setCullBackfacingTriangles(boolean cullBackfacingTriangles)
      Whether to hide triangles that face away from the camera.
      void setFov(double horizontalFov, double verticalFov)
      Sets the full horizontal and vertical field of view in radians.
      void setMaterial(Material material)
      Sets the material for all geometry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Renderer

        public Renderer(int superSample)
        Creates a renderer with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        superSample - the square root of the number of anti-aliased samples.

    • Method Detail

      • setCullBackfacingTriangles

        public void setCullBackfacingTriangles(boolean cullBackfacingTriangles)
        Whether to hide triangles that face away from the camera. Defaults to true.

      • lookAt

        public void lookAt(Vector eye,
                   Vector target,
                   Vector up)
        Position the camera at "eye" looking at "target" with "up" either specified or pointing to the Y axis if null.

      • setFov

        public void setFov(double horizontalFov,
                   double verticalFov)
        Sets the full horizontal and vertical field of view in radians.

      • setMaterial

        public void setMaterial(Material material)
        Sets the material for all geometry.

      • addTriangle

        public void addTriangle(Triangle triangle)
        Add a triangle to the geometry being rendered.

      • prepareGeometry

        public void prepareGeometry()
        Precompute various geometry things, like bounding boxes.

      • render

        public BufferedImage render(int width,
                            int height,
                            float u,
                            float v,
                            float du,
                            float dv)
        Generate an image of size width and height. U and v are the upper-left corner of the image on a 0 to 1 scale. Du and dv are the width and height on that same scale.
